modShortDescription: Now you cannot be 100% sure they died. The death sounds has been replaced with the pain sounds. The sound that they do when you hurt them.
modDescription:
Now you cannot be 100% sure they died. Especially if you also use Guppyâ€™s [Random Geter Upper](https://7daystodiemods.com/random-getter-upper/) and without the xp stats announce bar. The death [sounds](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-sound-mod/) has been replaced with the pain sounds. The sound that they do when you hurt them.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Robeloto/7D2D_A19_Modlets/tree/master/Robeloto_NoZombieDeathSound)** for A19  
**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Robeloto/7D2D_A18.4_Modlets/tree/master/Robeloto_NoZombieDeathSound)** for A18

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/12229-robelotos-modlets/).
